name: The Magic Crosses
description:
Each cross made from 4 objects.
You can rotate crosses around the axes.
Click on the cross to choose it.
Use the left and right buttons on the screen.
You can swap crosses.
Use 1,2,3,4,5,6 buttons on the screen.
Task:
All objects on the bottom row must have different colors.
All objects on the top row must have different colors.
All objects in the central row on the right sides of the crosses must have different colors.
All objects in the central row on the left sides of the crosses must have different colors.
All objects between crosses must have different colors.
Solution = 7 moves.

To exit the game use Esc button on your keyboard.
